website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight bag has a vintage style with modern functionality and features a single front pocket with a key clip, a 15-inch laptop sleeve, and comes in a variety of patterns and colors. Perfect for those looking for a simple backpack.
pros: Plenty of storage space for work materials
Holds its shape and protects the items inside
cons: Some have said the zippers tend to wear out over time

customer_reviews.title: The quality did not match the looks - hopefully the next one will be better
customer_reviews.text: Great looking backpack, but the zipper did not even last a year. [Edited] Turns out the zipper is covered under the Herschel's limited lifetime warranty and they are sending me a replacement backpack. Their customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: secret

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag for petite people
customer_reviews.text: This is it. The perfect bag. I love bags. However, I am a very petite woman--about 4'11. It's very hard to find backpacks that fit me without hanging down near my bottom. (That make me lean over and hunch my back) but that also have comfortable straps, and looks good. This bag is it! And it's spacious: I can carry my laptop, a water bottle, a lunch, and a client folder. It's like magic. Seriously, I can't stress how happy I am with this bag. The one thing I wish is that it came in the grey or cream colors it used to come in.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: seemed pretty sturdy for a backpack... until the zippers broke.
customer_reviews.text: Product started out great- lots of room, seemed pretty sturdy for a backpack. Was stylish and fit nicely on my back. I walk/bus to work and carry all my things with me in a backpack, so I needed one with room and that would withstand/was sturdy. Within three weeks, however, BOTH zippers broke and were unfixable. They broke within minutes of each other! I am so frustrated-- the whole reason I needed a new backpack was because my old one's zipper broke... after FOUR YEARS OF USE. NOT THREE WEEKS!! This is ridiculous-- Herschel is supposed to be a reputable company making nice, sturdy products... yet your zippers suck. Returning promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple backpack that will hold up through time
customer_reviews.text: Great overall backpack. This backpack is really for those that are just looking for a simple backpack. The material feels really sturdy and it seems to hold it's shape really well when carrying heavy stuff like text books and laptop. The front pocket has just enough space for small things like your phone, calculator, etc. My only complaint is that on the front pocket it doesn't have a pocket to hold like pens or small things that you would normally get with like a Jansport backpack. Oh and it's also nice that there's a laptop pocket on the inside so you know that your laptop won't get scratched when in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas J.

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY buy something else even if its not as trendy..
customer_reviews.text: Same Zipper issue! Bag looks nice, cool inside lining but quality is at the level I would expect a 15$ china knock off to be. This isnt my first Herschel issue either. I have the duffel bag with its plastic clips that sound like a creaking rocking chair when you're walking with the bag. I sent a message to Herschel who took 10 days to get back to me. I got tired of waiting and had to pay 15$ to get the 60$ 4 month old bag fixed! Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! So sturdy and the pattern inside is so so cute. The front pocket is really handy and I like that the laptop pocket in the backpack is really easy to slide your laptop into. I also find this backpack incredibly comfy, I used it on a few hikes as a day pack recently and it didn’t bother me at all! The big zippers are a nice look too. Hopefully it lasts a long time, I’ve only had it for about a month. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: @luluprime_

customer_reviews.title: This backpack was delivered with a few dark stains on ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was delivered with a few dark stains on the front; then I opened it up to see another person's named taped to the inside. It was my understanding that the bag was not pre-owned.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this backpack but the zippers—both of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this backpack but the zippers—both of them—have broken is multiple spots. When the zippers were initially working they were difficult to use requiring two hands and were not smooth. Eventually the zipper teeth started to break and move out of place. Now, they get stuck every time I try to open and close the bag.. Avoid this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My backpack arrived today and I really love it. It is the perfect medium sized backpack for travel and school that I have been looking for. I tend to carry things based on how much space I have, so I was looking for a backpack that would be large enough to carry essentials but also small enough to deter me from over packing --- and this bag does just that. I got the Black, which is a nice vivid black. The zip feels super strong, like really strong - i think it will last a really long time. It is also really chic and stylish. Overall great purchase and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really an amazing backpack, very good with styling! Loved it ! Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Luna

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, high-quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this backpack heavily--carrying around my macbook and countless books for uni, and using it stuffed full as a carry-on for various trips. It's held up well for the 5 months I've had it and I expect it will last. It's well built out of a sturdy but good-looking and relatively light material. The zippers aren't the smoothest, but I prefer it. I live in a big city and I feel that the zipping would make it easy to detect a pickpocket, or if something was falling out. Overall I definitely recommend investing in this backpack if you'll be using it long term and/or for heavy duty purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Adragna

customer_reviews.title: This thing is probably better suited for someone doing some weekend travel and packing ...
customer_reviews.text: I echo the sentiments of some of the other reviewers...the zipper is very rough and scratchy. My son hasn’t complained about that, but has mentioned that the backpack is small. He can only fit his binder and a couple of notebooks in this pack. Also, he said he ripped one of the interior pockets just by sliding his binder into the backpack. This thing is probably better suited for someone doing some weekend travel and packing a few items into it. It’s definitely a fashion backpack more so than a utility/school backpack.
customer_reviews.author: PatTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: SENT TWO AND NOW BEING CHARGED FOR RETURN SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than your average backpack, but quality seems good. I only ordered one backpack, but I was sent two, and now I'm being charged for return shipping. I am not at all happy and have tried to reach out to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Christa D.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke but Herschel Replaced the Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in February 2015. I love the style and the light weight. However, in January 2016 the main zipper stopped working. I don't know why- no over-usage or damaging incident. Just stopped catching and zipping. I expected it to last a couple of years, or at least until I graduated. I discovered that there is a warranty! A lifetime limited warranty. After emailing with Herschel about the broken zipper, they requested proof of purchase and some pictures, and gave me a code good for the original amount to their website. With the redemption code, I ordered a new backpack and it arrived in just a few days! Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: M&S La Benz

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag but small
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my daily commute to/from work/gym daily. I had a larger herschel bag but after 5 years, it wore down, figured I'd try a different style out but I returned it due to size and the metal zippers which tear my hands uppp reaching into the bag on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very rugged!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this for work and she couldn't be happier with it. It's a smaller scale backpack that fits plenty (macbook, papers, makeup, and lunch) and has great material and feel that Herschel is known for. She is 5'2 inches tall and Macbook Air is the 11 inch model. It takes a beating and has maintained its vibrant color. Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. So cute.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a backpack person, but I needed to become one to protect my shoulders from the weight of all my stuff. I've had this backpack for about 6 months nor and I've become a backpack person. I can fill out with stuff and it doesn't feel heavy. It's the perfect size and shape for commuting in the train everyday. It's super cute, I always get compliments on it, and It still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Troia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. It's the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. It's the perfect size. I am a petite 5'2" and it doesn't look too big and bulky on me but fits my laptop and books nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, good for college students
customer_reviews.text: Great for school! I went to college as a freshman this year and I've been using this backpack. It's not super big, so I can easily fit a laptop and a few journals with it to walk to classes without feeling like I brought too much with me! The zippers get a little bit stuck sometimes, and I've definitely scraped myself a good amount on them because of how heavy duty the zippers are, but it's great beyond that! I got this product from the Amazon warehouse, and it was said to be in less than perfect condition, but it looked new when I got it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good, but smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality basic pack. The strap padding could be a little more plush, especially for carrying a laptop and school books. It a pretty small pack. It fits a 15 inch laptop, but the rest of the pack is a little low on volume.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Limited number of pockets
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for what it is. The arm straps are very comfortable, the laptop pocket is wide enough for both my laptop and a notepad. But there are two pockets in the bag, no additional compartments. That has been a big issue for me. I like bags with a few more pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Poor Zipper, broke with light use and now bag is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: I initially posted 5 stars. The zipper is now useless and the bag is therefore useless. I originally loved the bag. and thought it was very stylish. Inside there is a red and white fabric, which now everyone sees because the zipper is broken. Do not get this bag, unless you intend not to use the zipper, which makes it a real waste of money. I've contacted the Company, but am upset at the other posts, which leads me to believe that any new item will be the same issue. Instead get a Thule bag!
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: this is great. I am currently a college student and have ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very sleek. I had previously been using a Herschel Pop Quiz backpack and was worried about downsizing, however, I have been impressed by how much I can fit in this backpack so far. It is a very simple and attractive backpack. If you're looking for a low profile but visually pleasing backpack, this is great. I am currently a college student and have had no issues carrying my laptop, books, notebooks, pens, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Collegecustomer123

customer_reviews.title: The only bag they need for an entire school year!
customer_reviews.text: The greatest thing about this Herschel is that it last through the school year. The zippers are high quality and don't break. The bag doesn't rip or tear. It holds it's color and structure, and though it looks well loved at the end of the year, it's still in great shape. This is the perfect size for an elementary school student. It doesn't hold binders well, but folders are perfect, and we also get a sack lunch, a sweater and plenty of school supplies loaded in it daily. Overall, great bag. Wonderful customer service from Herschel. Clearly, more pricey than some other bags, but for the quality, it's the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: giggleblue

customer_reviews.title: This bag is disgusting. The used description implied that it was still ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is disgusting. The used description implied that it was still in good condition. The used bag that arrived was filthy and covered in either dog or cat hair and the strap stitching is coming undone. I am actually grossed out to have it in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Hellball

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently using this as my backpack and I really like it. I feel like I am going to use it the next year if I don't plan on buying a new backpack. It really hold and it hasn't tore or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Florey Ramos

customer_reviews.title: great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great for everyday use. It's not too big for someone of my height (5' 4). The only grip I have about this bag is that I wish the front pocket was a big bigger but that serious to take a star away.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It is super light and sturdy. Since the first day it arrived (8/23) I carried it around everyday (today is 9/1). It is a top choice for college students. I can put my computer + notebook + pencil case +water bottle + keys + iphone all in it, and still carry it with ease. I highly recommend this type of backpack to girls (and boys) who have been tortured by heavy backpacks in high school.
customer_reviews.author: alexanderqi

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in the market for a book bag of some sorts for years. I’ve had an old hand me down computer bag for my office job for the last 3 years or so, and I wanted to get something that would be easy for me to load up more than just my computer & get on the go as my job requires an average amount of traveling. So far no complaints. I’m able to fit my computer, headphones, documents, and personal items without problem. I’ve also received some compliments as well. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: After using this for 9 months, it still looks as good as new and has no signs of wear. This can hold tons of stuff, but it doesn't look bulky. I love the placement of the pockets, I love the straps because they're really comfortable, and it's really light weight but can carry really heavy books. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Morecoffeeplz

customer_reviews.title: Great for high school student
customer_reviews.text: This is being used by a high school student and they are not being delicate! It has taken some abuse, has held up extremely well, and still looks amazing! We are VERY happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Just me Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a backpack to use walking around during the day as a tourist - needed to fit a 35mm camera, wallet, & sweater. That all fit, but barely. The outside pocket just barely zipped around my phone (in a thick otterbox case). I was hoping this would be stylish and look like something more chic than a basic college backpack. But honestly, the fabric and zippers aren't any more interesting than a basic Jansport model.
customer_reviews.author: Babu Riba

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it! Have been looking at these online & ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it! Have been looking at these online & in stores for awhile....a very basic backpack but with very hard wearing & good looking details. Heavy brass zippers with metal pulls. Sturdy padded straps, Fully lined. Extra pocket on front. Flat bottom so it sits up when you put it down. Extra interior pocket just right for my 12" Macbook. Heavy duty fabric. And I got it for less than some of the well known retailers sell it for!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Genuine backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is really spacious on the inside definitely fits a laptop. The design is true to the image . Many vibrant flowers on top of a black layout color. The straps are padded and sturdy too... the zipper is slow and sensitive it’s like that zipper material on jeans .
customer_reviews.author: Celest

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a school year
customer_reviews.text: I got this backpack for my brother, a middle school student. He liked the pattern. I told him he should get a backpack made by outdoor activity suppliers, since those tend to be more durable. This backpack broke in less than a year :(
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great work backpack for 13in laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work and it’s perfect size for a 13in MacBook. Very lightweight and smaller in size not as bulky as most backpacks are. Great for a commuting bag. I think it would be too small for an overnight bag unless it’s literally one outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Frequentshopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for my little kindergartener! It's well made and a great color that doesn't show dirt. Red and white stripe interior is great for locating your things within- as long as he's not just crazy rough on it I am hoping to have it for several years! Fits lots of folders and papers👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Tillia P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad and he loves it he uses it everyday to hold documents his laptop and random things. The quality of the bad feels really nice I’ll have to say.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in zipper quality
customer_reviews.text: For such a high quality and trusted brand I was disappointed to have the zipper handle in the front go flying off here and there as I was in the airport (not happy see photo ). Then I noticed the other one isn’t secure as well. Def not worth the $$. Have a backpack for over 6 years from urban outfitters and it looks unused to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Tore in two months...
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bag! The design, the pattern and laptop sleeve was great. I received it in the mail and it was packaged well in it's own plastic. After about two months and using it on campus the top of the stitching began to wear and soon tore. Usually I only carry my laptop, charger and one or two notebooks in my bag for class, so I'm not sure why it broke so quickly. I've had to sow it up several times to fix but it keeps happening. Overall for the price, the quality is not that great. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luz M

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Sucks but Otherwise Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight backpack that has a great pouch for a laptop. I love the inside design and the exterior is durable. However the gold zipper gets stuck ALL the time and it’s really annoying. That’s the only downside though.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: The zipper would get stuck a lot which was super frustrating and I was about to return it but ...
customer_reviews.text: A little bigger than I expected and the color online is deceiving. I thought I was buying white but it's actually a kind of beige color. The zipper would get stuck a lot which was super frustrating and I was about to return it but it gets better with use!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Yehudai

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with it because the quality isn't that great for ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product. I am not happy with it because the quality isn't that great for what you pay. That is something that I would be willing to look past but what I can't look past are all of the stains that came on the book bag. It really is unacceptable. I was not expecting that and I wish it would've been examined somewhat before shipping out to me. I don't have a problem spending the money if the book bag doesn't arrive with stains. My review would've been better if it weren't for that.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect perfect perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this backpack I’ve had it for a long time now and it has survived me around 1 1/2 school years as of now and is still going strong. I know some people commented about the zippers breaking but if you aren’t super rough with them I haven’t seen any problems and I use it pretty much daily
customer_reviews.author: 19cmartoccia

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: The canvas fabric took me by surprise. It's a lot thicker than expected which is excellent since it'll definitely last a long time. The 2 things i didn't like as much is the zipper quality and not much space. As far as the zipper goes, it doesn't glide so smoothly but it does seem sturdy. The space isn't a big issue. Since I'm not in school anymore I'm not carrying text books so it's probably better that it's so compact and slim. If you intend to carry a laptop and textbooks then go for a more spacious Herschel backpack. Otherwise it's good and I love the black.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. Beautiful colors, both inside and out. Not that many pockets, but I understand that it is also more of a fashion backpack. Perfect for what I use it for. It has one of those key clips on the inside of the small front pocket. Very nice material, and easy to wipe off with a damp cloth if it gets dirty. 10/10 would buy Herschel again.
customer_reviews.author: Allison R.

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack ever! I thought it was going to be a bit small for me but it's not! It fits my MacBook Pro 13" perfectly, my iPad, notebook, bottle of water, my wallet (which is not hat small), and always something else. Very good quality - as always! I love this brand! I have 2 other backpacks from Herschel and I would go for any other brand than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I like how this backpack is smaller then the rest but still have the laptop compartment unlike others that are the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It looks very trendy. I bought the black with the brass/gold zippers and used it as my "personal item" for a flight. Perfect size. The inside is a white/red stripe pattern. I especially like the inside padded compartment. It fits my 15" laptop. My only complaint is that the zipper is only a one way zipper. Meaning, you start zipping from one side and zip completely to the other side. No two zippers to meet in the middle, like the Jansport bags have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing for travel. I took it with me to Disneyland and it really held up and held my stuff for the day.
customer_reviews.author: 8 kids

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: At first sight this backpack seemed small, especially compared to the backpack my son carried around last year. Fortunately, everything fit inside with room to spare. The front pocket can hold a medium size Gatorade bottle and lunch items. The main compartment held a three ring binder and school essentials; to my surprise, on text book day he was also able to fit two of the large hard cover text books and a paper text book! My son is 5' tall and the bottom of the pack hits just right at his lower back.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think, but sufficient.
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than I expected, but turned out to be a great size for my city-dwelling self. I rather like the size as opposed to the full size one now. It’s just smaller. More aero-dynamic if you will. It’s a good one. Smaller IS better.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was lookin for: compact, but spacious
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’2” and carry a fair amount of stuff for work everyday + gym clothes sometimes. I prefer a backpack because it’s more comfortable than a tote, but I didn’t want a massive bag while commuting, which I had previously. This fits all my crap while staying compact and maintaining its shape. It’s simple details & slim design go with my work outfits and it doesn’t feel like I’m lugging around a school bag.
customer_reviews.author: emrd2705

customer_reviews.title: why didnt i buy this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, did not hold up well to my daughters dog but that's her stupid fault for leaving it out with an energetic young dog.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Straps broke after 5 months of use. Only used it for a laptop and day planner - I walk 1 mile to work and back daily.
customer_reviews.author: Cobbweb4

customer_reviews.title: But It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book bag and Herschel is a great and high quality brand! I feel like the bag will last a long time and can easily work for school and work! Can’t wait to try more of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at the pack for a long time and when I saw it on sale, I was so excited. I have a larger duffle I use as a gym bag in the same colors. The quality is so great and the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mkg

customer_reviews.title: The inside has a red pattern which I think is super cute. It also has a laptop sleeve which ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this backpack everyday for school. The inside has a red pattern which I think is super cute. It also has a laptop sleeve which is super convenient since I'm always slipping my laptop into my backpack after every class. Besides that, there aren't any more compartments. It's a really nice simplistic backpack to have. The only thing that was bad was that a tiny hole ripped in the front... but maybe it's because I've been using it for a whole year.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. The only thing I wish was different is the zipper. It's such a high grade that it's hard to zip sometimes, and it's sharp. I wish it had two zippers, not just the one. But, man, it's a perfect size, excellent quality and a stylish color. FAN despite it's misgivings. :)
customer_reviews.author: Beeeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Herschel is Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have this backpack, and both of us love it! It is mid-sized - just right for daily use. Both backpacks have held up well over time. My original Herschel Supply Co. backpack (purchased many years ago!) that I use for business travel is still in excellent condition. For us, Herschel is the backpack of choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: I bought one gray and one black Herschel backpack. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one gray and one black Herschel backpack. These two back's zipper were broken in a couple months. I contact Herschel and they requested me to send pictures for different part of those bags to them. And the Herschel customer service department told me that those two Herschel I bought "did not share common design elements" made by Herschel Supply Co.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Our family purchased this backpack to carry diapers ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Our family purchased this backpack to carry diapers for our newborn. He's only 4 months old and the bag is already popping holes in the fabric. This backpack gets carried from house to car, car to store, etc. It never bears heavy loads and it isn't dragged around. I can only guess the material is flawed. When contacted, customer service told me that this is normal wear and tear - not covered by warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend about a year ago, he uses it everyday for work & when he travels. We have no had any issues with it! stitching is holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lennys Nopala

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fashionable!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Bought it for my wife as a Xmas gift since she’s going back to school! Very practical and space for her supplies!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for college - comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm in college so I am constantly out and walking around, this backpack fits my 15" macbook and any notebooks that I need for class. I would like a bigger front pocket for wires and earphones. And the leather zipper pulls come right off but I don't really care. The zippers are nice, as opposed to the JanSport ones that always got stuck on the fabric of the backpack and thread. I can wear this backpack comfortably and it keeps all my stuff safe. Except, keep in mind, it is not waterproof. Don't expect to safely store your cellphone in the front pocket if you're walking in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Saleena

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and executed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack -- it's simple, the fabric is tough and the zippers are chunky and easy to zip. There's lots of internal storage space uncomplicated by unnecessary pockets or zippers. The laptop sleeve inside is good for anything from an iPad to a 15 inch laptop (I've used it for both).
customer_reviews.author: Customer Since 1997

customer_reviews.title: ripped in under a month!
customer_reviews.text: So the bag itself is fine. it's really not a one star backpack. But after less than three weeks of use, there is a hole at the top, going through all the layers of fabric! I heard great things about this company's quality, but i'm not seeing the results. I guess now i'll see about their customer service quality as i attempt to get this repaired/ replaced.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for my 4-year-old entering pre-k in the fall
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my 4-year-old entering pre-k in the fall, where I'm told they'll need a backpack big enough to fit a standard folder. I'm hoping it will hold up for at least a few years of elementary school. I just wanted to note that they've added two zipper pulls for the main compartment (just having one seemed to be a common complaint in these reviews). Also, my zipper glides smoothly (another common complaint), but I should note that I got the green color which includes a plastic zipper -- it seems like perhaps the ones w/ metal zippers are the problem?
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is absolutely perfect. The bag is very lightweight but quite substantial
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is absolutely perfect. The bag is very lightweight but quite substantial. An internal pocket houses a 15 inch macbook with plenty of room to spare. The front pocket has a key clip. Straps are nicely padded and adjustable. Love the color and especially love the inside lining. Perfect bag for both women and men--use for travel, lugging around kid's stuff, or use as a daypack.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for yoga gear.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my yoga teacher. She always complimented my basic black Herschel backpack. This one is nice. It's a little bit smaller than the normal backpack, and the plastic zipper is harder to zip than the metal. I'm giving it 4 stars because she's obsessed with it, and uses it every day.

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is perfect for every day use
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is perfect for every day use. I had originally ordered the classic size and immediately swapped it for this. The mid-volume is just what I was looking for in a commuter bag. Using public transportation to commute to work, I constantly have back pain from my heavy handbags loaded with all my knick-knacks and food for the day. Thanks to this bag, the weight is now balanced on both shoulders and I am able to bring gym clothes, food and anything else I could need. Plus the polka dots are super cute :)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect commuter backpack

I don’t always need a full size back pack to carry my things, so this is exactly what I’m looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Herschel customer Service is AWFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Herschel customer Service is AWFUL! I bought the book bag for my son who is still in Elementary school. My thought for paying more (than a typical elementary backpack) was that the quality was better and he would get years of use out of it. Well after a year, the zipper is broken. I contacted customer service. They responded and asked me to provide them with proof of purchase along with pictures. They have not responded back after weeks and multiple attempts on my part to get a response. Upon googling it appears that the zipper quality is a MAJOR problem. Buyer beware. Update... I will say they finally contacted me and resolved the problem.

product_meta.title: Herschel Settlement Backpack
product_meta.description: Herschel Supply's popular settlement silhouette sized and designed specifically for youth.
feature_bullets: HERSCHEL COLLECTION: Click on our brand logo at the top of the page to explore the full collection from Herschel Supply.

WARRANTY: We stand behind the quality of our products with a Limited Lifetime Warranty - our guarantee that every Herschel Supply item is free of material/manufacturing defects. This warranty begins on the date of purchase and covers common/everyday use for the duration of the original purchaser’s lifetime. Herschel Supply’s warranty is only valid on products purchased from authorized retailers. Amazon and select Amazon affiliates are the only authorized retailers on Amazon.

HIGH QUALITY: Crafted from a durable polyester fabric, the quality construction of the Settlement backpack is made to last through every adventure you take it on. This iconic vintage style is modernized through thoughtful design features, such as tech-safe storage and exposed zippers with pebbled zipper pulls. Spacious, versatile and tech-friendly, the Settlement is suited for both your everyday commutes and your airplane carry-ons.
MEN/WOMEN/UNISEX: The Settlement backpack was made for everyone. Use it for your commute, the school week, a business trip, or a weekend adventure.
23L CAPACITY: 17.75” high and 12. 25” wide. From your passport to your heavy textbooks, there’s plenty of space to fit everything you need for school, work or travel.

COMFORTABLE CARRYING: Padded, contoured shoulder straps and breathable air mesh back padding, designed for a more supportive and comfortable commute to work or school. The Settlement also makes for the perfect airplane carry-on.

EASY TO ORGANIZE: Multiple compartments keep your essentials organized. Tech-safe sleeve is padded and lined with fleece, fits laptops up to 15”, while the front pocket offers a key clip for keeping your keys in place. An internal media pocket is the ideal fit for your smartphone, and the additional headphone port is perfect for an on-the-go playlist.
